!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 368 Mar 19, 2004 13:22:26.195
!MESSAGE Resource /org.eclipse.ui.workbench/Eclipse
UI/org/eclipse/ui/handlers/WidgetMethodHandler.java does not exist.

ResourceNode didn't handle non-existing resources. Solution is to have our team
subclass return null if the resource doesn't exist. This was easy to reproduce
with binary incoming additions, but for some reason most java/text merge viewers
handled the exception.
